input_text:
Job Title: Senior Traffic Engineer – Leader

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
At our company, we are guided by our principles of being “People Focused and Project Driven”. With over a century of expertise, we have earned a reputation for both superior work quality and outstanding employees. This is your opportunity to become part of our team, where you can contribute to understanding today’s challenges and developing strategies to enhance the transportation of people and goods.

We are currently seeking a Traffic Engineering Leader to help establish and lead a traffic engineering group in the Texas market. This role is crucial for our expansion in Texas, including staff recruitment and mentorship, and will influence our strategic direction and growth in the region and across the company. Leadership duties encompass maintaining ethical business practices, strategic business planning, goal setting, fostering positive client relationships, maintaining open communication with partners and team members, and overseeing the growth of our roadway design sector. The ideal candidate will be dynamic and have a proven record in managing transportation projects with the Texas Department of Transportation, local municipalities, counties, and regional planning organizations. This position offers a significant career advancement opportunity.

Requirements

15+ years of experience in transportation project design

BSc. Civil Engineering

Professional Engineer (P.E.) license in Texas

Preferably strong knowledge of TXDOT Policies and Procedures

Demonstrated experience in leading and expanding engineering teams and building strong professional relationships

Excellent communication and business development capabilities, including client engagement, strategic partnerships, proposal preparation, and presentation delivery

Proficiency in all facets of engineering project management, such as drafting work scopes, budgeting, and scheduling

Availability to travel to project sites, company offices, and client meetings

Openness to adopting and advancing new technologies and methods in work processes

Benefits

We acknowledge the vital role our employees play in our success and reflect this in the extensive benefits package offered to full-time staff:

Flexible scheduling options

Competitive salary

Paid time off and holidays

Health insurance benefits

Group Life Insurance, with additional optional life, short, and long-term disability insurance available

Flexible spending accounts for medical and dependent care expenses

401(k) Retirement Plan

Tuition reimbursement

Employee Assistance Program

Parental and maternity leave benefits

Join us in shaping the future of transportation in a role where your contributions will be truly valued.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Senior Traffic Engineer – Leader
output_json.summary: Seeking a Traffic Engineering Leader to establish and lead a traffic engineering group in the Texas market.
job_responsibilities: Maintaining open communication with partners and team members
Overseeing the growth of the roadway design sector
output_json.travel_requirements: Availability to travel to project sites, company offices, and client meetings
output_json.company_information: Our company is guided by principles of being ‘People Focused and Project Driven’. We have a century of expertise, known for superior work quality and outstanding employees.
